Game.Name: V.I.P. (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl)
Game.plot: Premise of the TV-show and gameVallery Irons is a small town girl who accidentally saves a major celebrity’s life and gets the attention of the media. A competent but unknown security firm then hires her in order to exploit her fame. She should be just a figure head for the firm, and has been told that she'll "probably never even leave the office” while others do the dirty work, but somehow Vallery gets caught up in the wacky action as well.Characters:Vallery IronsReal LifeIn-game (PS2)Vallery loves expensive clothes, shopping and celebrities. She has no bodyguard training at all and fights poorly. However, she is unusually lucky, which is played for laughs in V.I.P.. Tasha DexterReal LifeIn-game (PS2)Tasha is an ex-agent excels in tactical thinking and espionage operations. She is a skilful and serious bodyguard who finders herself at odds with the playful Vallery Irons from time to time. Nikki FrancoReal LifeIn-game (PS2)Nikki is a hot headed weapons and explosives expert who really likes to blow stuff up. This street smart woman can also handle the fast cars around with unmatched precision. Kay SimmonsReal LifeIn-game (PS2)Kay is a computer wizard and all-around geek. She takes care of communications and logistics for the V.I.P. Quick WilliamsReal LifeIn-game (PS2)Quick is a hand to hand combat expert and a cool guy. He also has experience in forensics work. Johnny LohReal LifeIn-game (PS2)Johnny is an athletic martial arts expert who brings some zen-balance to the crew.
Game.Notes: Supermodel Pamela Anderson gets another shot at the spotlight in this video game based on Anderson's hit television series. Just like the show, this game has plenty of action, humor, and strategic depth to keep you engaged and, of course, there are also supermodels (if you like that sort of thing). Anderson's character, Vallery, is the star of the game, and you'll help guide the buxom blonde through 30 massive levels of fun and excitement. Vallery being a bodyguard, there are lots of high-profile clients who will enlist her (your) services. You'll have to use martial arts skills, high-tech weaponry, and some of Vallery's signature abilities in order to fend off the bad guys, keep your clientele happy, and make sure the world is safe for everyone.
